title: SellerBalance
description: DTO for Provider Balance as seen by an Investor

pip_charge.description: The point per percent charge applied to investors who follow this seller

service_min_balance.description: How much credit must an investor have to be able to subscribe to this seller

subscribed.description: If the currently logged in user is subscribed to this seller

datail_url.description: The url for more detailed information
